name: WW2: Bunker Simulator
description:
In World War 2 - Bunker Simulator, you play as an American soldier of the 101st Airborne Division, who performs a mission during World War II. Your task is to defend the captured German bunker. To survive you must always be ready: fed, rested and full of energy.

Well, it won't always be that easy. Remember to check the supply regularly. If there are not enough bandages, food or ammunition, send a message to the command with a request for delivery. It is mandatory to enter the password in the walrus code. You can always search the bodies of those killed in battle - sometimes you will even find chocolate!

You must also take care of your companions. Order wisely and share food.

Perform missions - be vigilant - the enemy can come at any time. Fortunately, you have a machine gun, anti-aircraft gun, and an anti-tank cannon. Receive encrypted messages and anticipate your enemy's plans. And it's good to put your faces in the right places, always 'one less'.
